page.title: 13 A SCHOOL DAY IN RUGELEY.
page.content: My school day starts at 7.00am. My clock radio wakes me. Breakfast is cereal honey on toast and orange juice. I watch T.V. for sport and news. From home to school takes 10 minutes. I chat with friends then line up to go into school when the whistle blows at 9.00am. The teacher calls the register to see if we are present. Next is assembly. Lessons are Maths, Language, Project, History and other things. We have Art and Craft, P.E. Games, Swimming and Computer work. There are two playtimes and a dinner break. I like school because I meet my friends.
